messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On September 5, DET. Z. X. Black was informed of a suspicious fire at Pinebrook Apartments. Principal informants were Mr. Parker, a resident, and Ms. Morris, the building manager. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. Y. W. Holt - OPERATIONS Det. Black, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective A. B. Reed and Detective C. D. Wright joined for the on-scene investigation. ELMER 08:15 Arson Mr. Parker reported smelling gasoline before the fire, and Ms. Morris provided CCTV footage of the building's entrances. Flame. Technician Iris collected samples from the fire's origin. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Black Sr, Det. Reed, Det. Wright OPERATIONS Lt. Holt INFORMANT Morris, Elaine 89 Oak Drive, Pinebrook, Vermont 147-540. 92385. ELMER 08:15 Arson By 10:30 AM, Detectives Black, Reed, and Wright, along with Lieutenant Holt, identified a suspicious individual from the footage. Captain E. F. Gomez set up an alert for nearby stations. Sergeant G. H. Nelson and Sergeant I. J. Quinn began questioning residents. By noon, a potential suspect was taken into custody. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Black Sr, Det. Reed, Det. Wright OPERATIONS Lt. Holt AFFIDAVIT - Arson Report 1) CCTV Footage 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Sample Analysis 5) Apartment Entry Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE K. Lewis P.P.D. 14.98 P38 1671 Parker, ANDREW NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 100-1973 DETECTIVE: Z. BLACK ITEM: 38-4650- 91 CRIME: 08:15 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 81940 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 3/05/23 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. Z. X. Black  Officer Context: On September 5, DET. Z. X. Black was informed of a suspicious fire at Pinebrook Apartments. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. Y. W. Holt  Officer Context: Lt. Y. W. Holt - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective A. B. Reed  Officer Context: Detective A. B. Reed and Detective C. D. Wright joined for the on-scene investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective C. D. Wright  Officer Context: Detective A. B. Reed and Detective C. D. Wright joined for the on-scene investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Iris  Officer Context: Flame. Technician Iris collected samples from the fire's origin. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Black  Officer Context: By 10:30 AM, Detectives Black, Reed, and Wright, along with Lieutenant Holt, identified a suspicious individual from the footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Reed  Officer Context: By 10:30 AM, Detectives Black, Reed, and Wright, along with Lieutenant Holt, identified a suspicious individual from the footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Wright  Officer Context: By 10:30 AM, Detectives Black, Reed, and Wright, along with Lieutenant Holt, identified a suspicious individual from the footage. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain E. F. Gomez  Officer Context: Captain E. F. Gomez set up an alert for nearby stations. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant G. H. Nelson  Officer Context: Sergeant G. H. Nelson and Sergeant I. J. Quinn began questioning residents. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant I. J. Quinn Officer Context: Sergeant G. H. Nelson and Sergeant I. J. Quinn began questioning residents. Officer Role: Sergeant
